comment.body: @ks: allowing external pics may have privacy issue IMO.
i did not  see @Prexxett's posts in my “Followed users” timeline
@ks: maybe because of browser's cache. try to clear it, or restart it.

@ɃǾȾ: @nofish explained it in this post comment: http://127.0.0.1:53110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1RedkCkVaXuVXrqCMpoXQS29bwaqsuFdL/19M1DT5vruSATEcbEczYRwCk2uPuLcATBa/17 , and From the next version the merger permission will be automatically revoked from merged sites.
终于在这看到你了
@Nofishes: 哈哈，还有文言文版，你自己翻译的？
你好，确切的说应该是ZeroMe上线

你在不停的换hub，当然引起混乱啊，不过信息应该还在的，你自己看：  http://127.0.0.1:53110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/12h51ug6CcntU2aiBjhP8Ns2e5VypbWWtv/171fhZp8nPaJTLfTnov3hSQE8pweTcf6wC/xyzos@zeroid.bit 
还有这个 http://127.0.0.1:53110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i/171fhZp8nPaJTLfTnov3hSQE8pweTcf6wC/xyzos@zeroid.bit

这个地址是新的ZeroMe用户才点的！老用户千万不要点里面的Join！！你的信息混乱丢失，就是因为乱点！乱点后就会重置一些信息！老用户换电脑登录，如果没有自动登录，可以点Select user to post new content，选择自己的ZeroID，然后千万不要点Create new profile，而应等待进度条走完，然后按F5刷新就已登录了。我亲测可行！等会儿加入论坛置顶贴。乱点的后果自负！
@Xyzos: 我楼里给你的两个链接都不是蓝hub的，你点到哪去了？数据将会逐步把老贴覆盖。以后你不要乱点了，注意事项见我在你新一条帖子的回复。

@ks: we really need a nice migrating hub feature. before @nofish implement that, you can write a script to do the migrating. I think the script which can gracefully migrate comments related to posts would be helpful for all we active/talky users

@Nofish: I think there should be an option to turn off the auto-deleting. IMO auto-archive as optional files is better, because ZeroMe is not totally like twitter, but more like facebook/G+, with no post size limit (e.g. 140 char). Users may use facebook/G+ as their blog, posting long-life, valuable articles, so does ZeroMe.

@ks: but if most users use their own hub, much more connections are needed, which is really bad for Tor always users. Tor is not for many connections in my test. A few hubs are OK, but we need a nice migrating hub feature. Maybe a user-request, new-hub-owner-then-do-the-migrating feature can deal with comments and other problems perfectly?
@Nofish: there would be some volunteers running servers archiving them, just like running proxies, automatic seeders...
@Nofish: another ZeroMe similar problem: could we have `Join` lock until sync is completed to prevent exiting users of ZeroMe to join another hub by clicking the `Join`?
@19: I have a snapshot of your data.json http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MgHVPCE1ve6QfKrgsqCURzRj72HrRWioz/?13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ_15

@Nofish: probably not the hub, but ZeroMe user registry site sync is not completed after the user transfer users.json to another newly install ZeroNet,  then clicking the `Join` before sync is a disaster.
@Nofish: archiving node can do snapshot of course, but without old posts hosted in same site, the links to old posts will be broken . Auto-redirect to archiving node? I'm not sure.
吼啊，期待更多原创博文
@ks: bad news! I guess the limited quota of ZeroTalk and nofish's ZeroBlog make him leave. He complained it several times.
@Cxgreat2014: 其实主要是前端，后端API基本都完善了。JS、CSS这些。不过往后作者可能用ZeroMe这种merger架构来重构zeroblog，前端和内容数据分离，可以用同一个阅读器来阅读其他zeroblog

@Cxgreat2014: 所谓阅读器不是传统理解的阅读器。你现在看到的这个zite本质上就是一个阅读器，阅读其他hub的内容。要炫技可以写个牛b的阅读器，顺便安利自己的博客。
你主要是写什么语言的程序？
@Cxgreat2014: ZeroNet上更需要前端人才，可偏偏来这的前端人才极少。

@Helloarch: 你说的EA指什么？StartSSL被天朝公司**秘密**收购，所以所谓外国公司不一定靠谱。不过我不明白为什么一定要用360这类软件？360之流只是个大杂烩，每个功能都能找到对应靠谱甚至开源的工具。
@Helloarch: 所以有必要收集打包个工具集，替代360之流。不知有谁擅长这方面。其实个人使用习惯挺重要的，我个人也没怎么用什么工具啊。
@Helloarch: 我个人偶尔用用开源的bleachbit和Sysinternals的autoruns，后者被微软收购了，可以认为是微软官方的。其他的工具好像不是很必要。

@Nekocross: 早见过这样的，我还见过3个hub的。所以我才在置顶贴强烈警告。
@weakish: 图形界面的操作就是在右侧隐藏菜单里，把最底的content.json改为[useraddress]/content.json，最后点击sign 、publish

anyway，我看不到美国有GFW。“自由有许多困难，民主亦非完美，然而我们从未建造一堵墙把我们的人民关在里面，来防止他们离开我们。” ---约翰·肯尼迪

谁今天上午没开zeronet，上线后发现你这条推在ZeroHello左侧马上pause你的网站，或许还能找到你老的json。0chan不给克隆应该是有道理的，克隆后跟原网站还保持某种联系，结果你在原网站操作，克隆站也受到影响。

@Smallorange: 周一到周日都算下周：）
@Smallorange: i2p支持比较遥远
@Smallorange: 核心就nofish一个人啊。想要参与开发必须非常熟悉zeronet后台代码，目前还没人
@Nekocross: 严格来说tor不行，i2p可以。但是到.onion的通信虽然经过了exit node但是没有出tor网络，仍然可以认为在tor网络内部。所以tor也能不经过明网相互通信。
这个问题我一个月前就向nofish反馈了，好像没有彻底解决。有些人误加入多个hub也是这个原因。大家有什么解决思路吗？
@HelloArch: 加入(Join)跟下载(Download) hub是不同的，你全新安装一个ZeroNet重新感受一下

你去看作者博客，optional files可以设置Limit的，不会占满硬盘。不过这个设置limit的权限在代理上也向访客开放了，有点不合理，可以改进。
@Cxgreat2014: 或许可以让作者支持每个站点设置optional files限额
@Kha: 请看中文论坛首页FAQ
某个用户的文件没有完全发布到别的节点就TA下线了
@Cxgreat2014: 首先你得是高价值目标才会来搞你。不会没事闲得蛋疼的。@怡红院
@怡红院: 你连不上网的情况，首先要仔细看编程随想的教程，对照检查各项设置。实在不行原博文下的评论区看看，或许能找到解决线索。
@Nassau: 是要小心。如果按照编程随想说的做法去做，就能防范绝大多数攻击了。本身如果不是高价值目标，就没必要担心APT这种定点攻击。至于造价值，技侦跟审讯往往不是同一个人，之后还经过检察院、法院，所以捏造出来的价值可能会露出破绽，造价值的可能性不大。
@Nekocross: 在启动参数里指定现有的tracker，应该就行了，不需要额外部署。tracker是大家都用相同的几个才有意义的，否则只有你自己到某个tracker自嗨没意义。其他常识，请看中文论坛首页FAQ
这一波涨势是什么原因？还没到几年前的高点吧？
@Sqbing: 应该不是你说的意思。zeronet proxy 一般指gateway，提供明网访问zeronet的入口。不要用你的重要帐号登录zeronet proxy，因为有可能泄露你的密钥。
@Lmath: 每个拥有公网IP的ZeroNet节点都能通过简单配置成为bootstrapper。请看中文论坛首页FAQ
@自由之潮 P2pwave: 你到底有没有看中文论坛首页FAQ
@Nassau: 会不会对比特币进一步打压？例如端掉或者限制交易平台
@Kha: 墙内有公网IP的ZeroNet节点能配置成bootstrapper啊，墙内其他节点再以这些bootstrapper来引导（通过设定启动参数）。0.5版的zeronet好像会保存节点信息到硬盘了，下次启动不需要引导也能连上部分节点。

@Mkg20001: Hello, it is so great to see you are working on https://travis-ci.org/mkg20001/ZeroNet-kivy the log exceeds 4MB limit, so you would consider to set: 
```
# (int) Log level (0 = error only, 1 = info, 2 = debug (with command output))
log_level = 1
```
in buildozer.spec

@Mkg20001: WOW, Great! Succeed! Would you [make Travis CI automatically upload APK to your GitHub repo](https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/deployment/releases/) _and_ [Pushing-a-Docker-Image-to-a-Registry to save build time](https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/docker/#Pushing-a-Docker-Image-to-a-Registry) ? THX!!

@Mkg20001: I think you can try to reverse the modification in buildozer.spec:
```
-#android.sdk = 20
+android.sdk = 24
```
``` 
 # (str) Android NDK version to use
-#android.ndk = 9c
+# android.ndk = 12b
```
```
-android.bootstrap = sdl2
+# android.bootstrap = sdl2
```
@Mkg20001: you tried to build in your local machine?
@Mkg20001: I heard that some version of SDK and NDK is buggy, so keep the default old version might be a good idea.

@Mkg20001: I don't think so. I was using the android_new toolchain. Did you try to install & run the APK I built which was upload the ZeroNet-kivy repo? If you still have problem, please try to use the repo's code and tutorial without any change to build.

@Mkg20001: Oh, sorry, I forgot to mention this in the packaging tutorial(I mentioned it in the inject.py_): plyer in pip is old and has bugs, so need to download source code manually from plyer repo to replace all the plyer source code folder downloaded by buildozer
Maybe there is better way (automatic way )to do that, but I don't know ( due to my poor skill)
@Mkg20001: https://github.com/kivy/python-for-android/issues/686

@Mkg20001: download https://github.com/kivy/plyer/archive/master.zip and replace all the plyer source code folder downloaded by buildozer (search plyer using your file explorer in ZeroNet-kivy/.builozer folder)
@Mkg20001: very tricky, isn't it? I spent lots of time finding  this. Please feel free to update the packaging tutorial and further, make a pull request to upstream buildozer.
@Mkg20001: what do you mean translate strings? Could you give me an example?
@Mkg20001: I think it is related python. How python deals with translating generally? Any module do that? @Nofish: @12h Study: @Lmath:
@Mkg20001: IMO APK version num. should be different from ZeroNet version num. because 0.5.2 will not be changed for a long time, but we'll have many new APK versions released.

@Mkg20001: Of course, originally I chose `if platform == 'android':` in [older version]( http://127.0.0.1:43110/17iF64gTLycSohUSJsFyq7FMYsQfMqghJa/?13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ_14), afterwards I needed to debug plyer so that I changed it to `if platform_flag == 'android':` Now I think is OK to change back and rewrite. BTW, I don't know which is better `from kivy.utils import platform` or `from plyer.utils import platform`
@Mkg20001:  i18n on kivy  https://github.com/kivy/kivy/issues/1664
@Mkg20001: THX! Looks neat! Much more readable! But IMO you would reserve `if StrictVersion(APK_version) > StrictVersion(APK_version_old):` to prevent update every time the APP starts.

@Mkg20001: I found that the my compiled APK does not support zeronet's newest serving-from-bz2-files feature.  Installing   `libbz2-dev` in building enviroment may fix it : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/12806122/missing-python-bz2-module
PS: other format .zip and .tar.gz are ok
@Mkg20001: bz2 module is officially built-in, so no need & no way to install bz2 module, Just `sudo apt-get install libbz2-dev` , and you've done it right in Makefile of the repo :)

@Mkg20001:  

>another simple way is using kivy's hex feature , an example in kv lang:
```
#:import hex kivy.utils.get_color_from_hex
    canvas:
        Color:
            rgba: hex('#03A9F4')
```

>As you can see here, in Kivy the first three numbers are just re-scaled RGB values to 0 and 1, and the last one is alpha. But remember you can set the mode, you could use hsv instead, not I guess you don't need that.

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/22932242/convert-rgba-color-codes-255-255-255-255-to-kivy-color-codes-in-1-1-1-1
`#:` is special-syntax in kv: https://kivy.org/docs/guide/lang.html#special-syntaxes

@Mkg20001: Roboto Font does not contain Chinese characters. Typically fonts which contain Chinese characters are big (e.g. DroidSansFallback.ttf ). The big font can be trimmed by fontmin ( but pre-mature optimizing is not a good idea ).
@Mkg20001: I don't know, maybe you can google?
@Mkg20001: :( unsupported yet. Then just use DroidSansFallback for all, no matter what kind of characters.
@Mkg20001: does kivy.utils.get_color_from_hex not work? what does light color mean?

@Mkg20001:I think kivy.utils.get_color_from_hex is doing its job right. https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_hexadecimal.asp             rgb: hex("#1E2429") <--> rgb: hex("#2B333C") these two lines should take each other's place IMO.
@Mkg20001: I have an idea: make the "Roboto" translatable -- `font_name: _("Roboto")` and specify the font in lang json (e.g. zh.json)

@Mkg20001: 
- To bypass not being bold issue we can use bigger font size on words we want to bold. In the future, we can customize the font to support all characters we use without suffering big font size when the UI becomes mature.
- IMO the update detecting logic should be added ASAP, otherwise, it unexpectedly overwrites all changes every time it starts, making it's hard and confusing to test and debug. 
- We need to add `keep_ssl_cert` to zeronet.conf to let m2crypto generate the cert, otherwise zeronet will delete the pem cert without generating again (due to openssl issue on android). 
- Unfortunately, bz2 module is still missing on android, I also re-complied after installing libbz2-dev, no luck. Even kivy official launcher has the problem. Would you file an issue to kivy's python-for-android project? 
- Your android locale detecting code works great! But zeronet itself doesn't. ZeroNet fails to detect locale on android and always shows EN. Would you make a pull request to ZeroNet, or add the locale to zeronet.conf (e.g. `language = zh`)?
@Mkg20001: all in zeronet folder excluding data & log folder, that's, py code got from zeronet built-in updating, zeronet.conf, plugin settings are overwritten.

@Mkg20001: I think comparing self.rev is not reliable. Please mind that there is zeronet's built-in update. Users can update zeronet to a rev even newer than your APK, then your APK will overwrite the newer code again and again.
@Mkg20001: You can deploy with ZeroNet*.apk https://stackoverflow.com/questions/25929225/how-to-deploy-to-github-with-file-pattern-on-travis
@Mkg20001: `Skipping a deployment with the releases provider because this is not a tagged commit.`? Any idea of adding `keep_ssl_cert` and `language = ??` to zeronet.conf?
@Mkg20001: because it should be a line of `keep_ssl_cert` , not `keep_ssl_cert = 1`

@Mkg20001: because we have to generate a self-signed cert to make ssl connection work ( you can check whether crypto exists in http://127.0.0.1:43110/Stats ). ZeroNet does it in /src/Crypt/CryptConnection.py 's createSslRsaCert(), but does not work on android. As a result, we have to generate the cert in APK 's code. 
As for `def saveValue(self, key, value):`, I think it lacks support for saving a key without value (e.g. a line of `keep_ssl_cert`). Hi, @Nofish: , how can we do that?

@Nofish: I think we need a graceful way to do that because currently APK is generated and uploaded automatically by Travis-CI which uses git submodule to get the zeronet's code automatically. ( it is not easy to find the right time to inject the zeronet.conf between Travis-CI getting the zeronet's code and starting packaging)
@Nofish: Then we have `keep_ssl_cert = ` instead of `keep_ssl_cert`?  ~~It works with the parser when zeronet starts?~~ It works, very triky, Orz
定期备份，最好是设置自动快照
@Mkg20001: Hi, would you tag the commit to let it upload to release? THX!

@Mkg20001: startForeground works! Great! Until now zeronet has  not been killed by system in my device! But there is one issue: the APK still update the dst zeronet every time the UI starts due to dst zero does NOT contain Config.py but Config.pyo. So IMO it's not reliable to parseRev in the run time. I think we need these strategies:
- In the build time of Travis CI, do the parseRev and save it to env.json
- In the run time, copy env.json to dst zero
- First time user run the new APK the , compare the env.json, determine whether need update. ( somewhat like the strategy of my old APK)

@西木野真姬: 什么系统？把之前的备份users.json覆盖之前，用文件对比工具对比一下users.json有哪些变动。log可以到log/debug.log里找

@12hlearn: 从我有限的C语言知识来讲（毕竟zeronet跑在CPython上），你跟nofish都期望user_data是users[self.master_address]的引用，并不创建个新的对象。但是python的实现不同、版本不同，这种期望可能最后得到偏差的结果。所以这种写法我认为不保险。举个例子，可能出现如下情况：
```
>>> a=1
>>> b=a
>>> b=2
>>> print a
1
```
何况python有GC，其行为难说了
@12hlearn: 另外users.json在open之后没有close，后面又对它atomicWrite写操作，难保不出现问题。python官网对open的建议哪怕是读操作都要用`with`

@12hlearn: 关于dict.copy() 和copy.deepcopy()如果这里说得没错的话，应该不会有大问题 https://stackoverflow.com/a/3975388 
那主要还是open读操作时都不with的问题。
